title: I just watched Mune on my new TV
body:
All I can say is wow, I can't believe what I was missing by watching movies on my phone or old 20 inch 1080p tv.

Gotta say I love the jump to 65 inches in 4k.

Plus, it makes a great monitor for gaming on both consoles and league. I notice no lag while gaming and it's much easier to game when the tv is mounted because before it was higher up on a stand and I had to tilt my neck and part of the  screen was covered in plastic.

https://i.imgur.com/C1Vc0x1.png[/img]

All those years of never upgrading my phone and smart budgeting has paid off, woohoo!
(I only had two smart phones, a galaxy s4 and a galaxy s6 I just recently got for a $5 upgrade)
